lead_paragraph: German sportswear company Adidas is monitoring how world athletics is dealing with a doping scandal while its current sponsorship deal still runs, the firm's chief executive said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Sponsor Adidas Says Closely Monitoring IAAF Progress Over Doping Scandal
headline.main: Sponsor Adidas Says Closely Monitoring IAAF Progress Over Doping Scandal

snippet: German sportswear company Adidas is monitoring how world athletics is dealing with a doping scandal while its current sponsorship deal still runs, the firm's chief executive said on Thursday....
